column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The wait was long but it was worth it
column2: we sat at the bar and we ordered the calamari
column4: mushrooms and spinach deep dish pizza and it was delicious
column5: the bartenders are very attentive and 5 stars to the service . The only reason why I gave 4 stars was that we found a piece of hair on the plate underneath the Lettuce of the calamari after we almost finished . The bartender told us he will take it off but I guess he forgot about it when he gave us the check
column6: it really didn't matter because We did almost finished the calamari and we were very happy to be there .
